item.description:
Dads no longer have to dread moms' night out! They can join an organized play date with other dads while moms go have some much-deserved fun. It's such a great idea, let's do it once a month! We will try to hold the DNI close to the MNO venue.

This month, let's gather at the Boston Children's Museum, which offers $1 admission Fridays 5-9pm. Dads can arrive after work when they can. At 6 (or when every child has their dad present), moms will head down the street to Papagayo for Mexican food and frozen margaritas!

The DNI portion is always optional. Moms can always just come by themselves.

If you have an idea or want to host, please let Yooree know.

Â
item.name: Dads' Night In/Moms' Night Out
